item.title: France will recognise Palestinian state, Macron says
item.description: France to become the first G7 state to recognise the state of Palestine, as Israeli PM Netanyahu condemns decision.

item.title: Five ice hockey players found not guilty in Canada sexual assault case
item.description: The verdict marks the end of the highly publicised case, in which the men were accused of sexually assaulting a woman in 2018.

item.title: One in five children in Gaza City is malnourished, UN aid agency says
item.description: The UN agency for Palestinians says it has thousands of truckloads of supplies near Gaza which it wants to deliver.

item.title: Too hot for Santa as Lapland buckles under record heatwave
item.description: After an unusually cold early summer, the whole of Finland has been plunged into two weeks of high temperatures.

item.title: Pro-Palestinian convict to be freed by France after 41 years
item.description: Georges Abdallah will immediately be expelled to his native Lebanon after his release on Friday.
